app.data_processing module¶

app.data_processing.analyse_data.analyse_data(df)¶

Simple analysis of the retrieved data.

Parameters:

df – Dataframe containing the match and results data

Returns:

Some nice printed statistics

app.data_processing.create_dataframe.add_data_to_dataframe(tournament, match_data, result_data)¶

Create the dataframe with combined match and results data, perform some cleanup actions then return the dataframe.

Parameters:

  • tournament – Tournament name for settings

  • match_data – Retrieved match data list

  • result_data – Retrieved results data list

Returns:

Dataframe
